Shout_ThickOfTheFight.Description:
Apply Bloodlust to yourself, granting +[1]% damage for each character in a [2] radius around you. Pay up to X more AP: X is equal to the number of other characters within range: For each AP you cannot pay in this way, apply 2 Battered and Harried to yourself.

Source Infusions:
1: You are left with at least 1AP after casting. Emulate the effects of Whirlwind within 5m.
2 (requires 5 Warfare): When you hit an enemy while performing a basic attack, apply up to Weakened III for 2 turns. Gain the Living Armour talent for 2 turns. Recover 1SP.
3 (requires 9 Warfare): Once per round, per target, while performing basic attacks, also perform a Battle Stomp on the targets struck, and recover 2AP.

Tiered statuses apply up to tier 3 and reduce resistances; see your journal for a full description.

Target_FlamingCrescendo.Description:
Apply Immolation to target character, causing them to erupt into flames when this status ends, or as they die, dealing [1] to characters in a 3m radius.

Source Infusions:
1: Base damage of explosion is increased by 40% and now only harms enemies.
2 (requires 5 Pyrokinetic): Also cast on the nearest visible enemy to your target that is within 13m of you. Recover 1SP.
3 (requires 9 Pyrokinetic): Instead of previous Source Infusion effects: Apply Immolation for 3 turns to every enemy with 13m. Each turn after, Immolation detonates, repeating its Source Infusion 1 detonation damage to enemies in a 3m radius.

Target_FrostyShell.Description:
Supernal ice plates target character, granting [1].
Cleanses Scorched, Charged, Calcifying, Poisoned, Suffocating, Plague, Dazzled, and Squelched.

Source Infusions:
1: Grants and restores +10% total Magic Armor (+1% per Hydrosophist).
2 (requires 5 Hydrosophist): Apply to all allies within 13m.
3 (requires 9 Hydrosophist): Grants and restores +2% total Magic Armor per Hydrosophist. Grants +10% to elemental Resistances (+1.5% per Hydrosophist). Remove 1 Harried (+0.3 per Hydrosophist). Recover 1SP.

Target_WinterBlast.Description:
Unleash winter's immortal hatred upon target point, dealing [1] to enemies in a [2] radius and creating ice in that space.

Source Infusions:
1: +15% damage (+3% per Hydrosophist) while casting. Apply 1 Harried (+0.2 per Hydrosophist).
2 (requires 5 Hydrosophist): Apply Increased resistance reduction of tiered statuses on the target by 15% (+2% per Hydrosophist) for 2 turns.
3 (requires 9 Hydrosophist): Shatter any frozen surface within target radius (as per the Shatter spell, ~75% of its damage). Grants an empowered Winter Blast spell that shatters frozen surfaces (as per the Shatter spell, ~75% of its damage), deals 1.5x damage and has a 1 turn cooldown, for 3 turns.

Target_WinterBlast_Empowered.Description:
Unleash winter's immortal hatred upon target point, dealing [1] to enemies in a [2] radius and creating ice in that space.

Source Infusions:
1: +15% damage (+3% per Hydrosophist) while casting. Apply 1 Harried (+0.2 per Hydrosophist).
2 (requires 5 Hydrosophist): Apply Increased resistance reduction of tiered statuses on the target by 15% (+2% per Hydrosophist) for 2 turns.
3 (requires 9 Hydrosophist): Shatter any frozen surface within target radius (as per the Shatter spell, ~75% of its damage). Grants an empowered Winter Blast spell that shatters frozen surfaces (as per the Shatter spell, ~75% of its damage), deals 1.5x damage and has a 1 turn cooldown, for 3 turns.

Projectile_FanOfKnives.Description:
In a single deft motion, throw a dagger at each enemy in a [2] radius around you, dealing [1].

Source Infusions:
1: +5% accuracy (+1% per Scoundrel) while casting. +25% damage (+4% per Scoundrel) while casting.
2 (requires 5 Scoundrel): Repeat base effects within 8m. +40% damage (+8% per Scoundrel) while casting. Attempt to sneak before casting.
3 (requires 9 Scoundrel): Gain an Empowered Fan of Knives skill that deals 1.5x damage, costs 3AP, has a 1 turn cooldown, and chains to another enemy in a 8m radius, for 3 turns.

Projectile_FanOfKnives_Empowered.Description:
In a single deft motion, throw a dagger at each enemy in a [2] radius around you, dealing [1], and chaining to another enemy in a 8m radius.

Source Infusions:
1: +5% accuracy (+1% per Scoundrel) while casting. +25% damage (+4% per Scoundrel) while casting.
2 (requires 5 Scoundrel): Repeat base effects within 8m. +40% damage (+8% per Scoundrel) while casting. Attempt to sneak before casting.
3 (requires 9 Scoundrel): Gain an Empowered Fan of Knives skill that deals 1.5x damage, costs 3AP, has a 1 turn cooldown, and chains to another enemy in a 8m radius, for 3 turns.

Projectile_ThrowingKnife.Description:
Throw a knife at target character with lethal accuracy, dealing [1].

Source Infusions:
1: +5% accuracy (+1% per Scoundrel) and +15% damage (+3% per Scoundrel) while casting. Recover 2AP.
2 (requires 5 Scoundrel): Repeat base effects. If cast while Sneaking, gain +40% damage (+8% per Scoundrel) while casting.
3 (requires 9 Scoundrel): +4 more daggers thrown. If cast while Sneaking, gain a second Throwing Knife skill that costs 3AP, has a 1 turn cooldown, and chains to up to 2 enemies in a 8m radius, for 3 turns.

Projectile_ThrowingKnife_Empowered.Description:
Throw a knife at target character with lethal accuracy, dealing [1].

3 (requires 9 Scoundrel): +4 more daggers thrown. If cast while Sneaking, gain a second Throwing Knife skill that costs 3AP, has a 1 turn cooldown, and chains to up to 2 enemies in a 8m radius, for 3 turns.

Target_TerrifyingCruelty.Description:
In a paroxysm of malice, tear into enemies within [2] of target point, dealing [1] to each.

Subjugated III consumes 7 Battered:
Target suffers damage when attacking this status' owner, making it less likely to do so; reduces AP recovery.

Source Infusions:
1: +25% damage (+4% per Scoundrel) while casting.
2 (requires 5 Scoundrel): Apply Ruptured Tendons for 1 turn. Apply 1 Battered (+0.2 per Scoundrel).
3 (requires 9 Scoundrel): Repeat base effects on enemies within 5m of you. If cast while sneaking, recover 1AP and gain +40% damage (+8% per Scoundrel) while casting.

Tiered statuses apply up to tier 3 and reduce resistances; see your journal for a full description.

Target_Infect.Description:
Afflict target character with a withering contagion, dealing [1].

Weakened III consumes 7 Battered:
Target's damage is reduced.
Terrified III consumes 7 Harried:
Target loses attack of opportunity and spends AP fleeing.

Target_GraspOfTheStarved.Description:
Summon spectral hands to rend your enemies, dealing [1] to those standing on blood surfaces or in blood clouds, as well as any who are Bleeding.

Weakened III consumes 7 Battered:
Target's damage is reduced.

Source Infusions:
1: +25% damage (+4% per Necromancer) per corpse within area of effect, while casting.
2 (requires 5 Necromancer): Before casting, replace surfaces and clouds within target radius with a blood surface. Apply 2 Battered (+0.3 per Necromancer per corpse within area of effect).
3 (requires 9 Necromancer): Repeat base effects. +25% damage (+4% per Necromancer) per corpse within area of effect, while casting. If there are 3 or more corpses within area of effect, repeat 1 more time.

Tiered statuses apply up to tier 3 and reduce resistances; see your journal for a full description.

Target_AMER_HorridWilting.Description:
Deal [1] to enemies in a [2] radius. Targets hit suffer 50% more damage as Water if they have no physical armor, and another 50% more as Physical if they have no magic armor.

Source Infusions:
1: Apply up to Vulnerable III for 2 turns.
2 (requires 5 Necromancer): +40% damage (+8% per Necromancer) while casting. Additional damage from missing armor is instead dealt when at least 50% of armor is missing.
3 (requires 9 Necromancer): +40% damage (+8% per Necromancer) while casting. Additional damage is instead 150% more. Detonate Brittle on targets hit.

Tiered statuses apply up to tier 3 and reduce resistances; see your journal for a full description.

Shout_Adrenaline.Description:
Apply Adrenaline to yourself, granting 4 AP but removing 6 AP at the start of your next turn. This effect cannot grant AP over your maximum.

Source Infusions:
1: Gain an additional 2 AP and apply Hasted to yourself for 1 turn.
2 (requires 5 Scoundrel): Gain +10% invested Power (+4% per Scoundrel) for 2 turns.
3 (requires 9 Scoundrel): Gain an additional 4 AP.

Shout_ChameleonSkin.Description:
Perform Sneak on cast, apply Invisible to yourself until the end of your turn, and apply Chameleon Cloak, granting +5 Sneaking.

Source Infusions:
1: Recover 2AP. +1 turn duration.
2 (requires 5 Polymorph): At the end of your turn, you attempt to sneak. +1 turn duration. Recover 1SP.
3 (requires 9 Polymorph): At the beginning of your turn, you become invisible until the end of your turn, and you attempt to sneak. +1 turn duration.

Shout_DeflectiveBarrier.Description:
Apply Deflecting to yourself, granting [1], immunity to teleportation, and reflecting projectiles that strike within 1m of you back to their source. This does not prevent the original projectile effects.

Source Infusions:
1: Apply Taunted for 1 turn to enemies within 5m.
2 (requires 5 Warfare): Allies within 13m, who have at least 1 Hydrosophist try to cast Healing Ritual on you as a free ritual reaction.
3 (requires 9 Warfare): Apply to all allies within 13m. Recover 1SP.

Cone_SteamLance.Description:
Generate scalding vapors, removing Weakened, Vulnerable, Brittle, and Plague from allies in a [4] degree, [3] long cone, and applying up to Vulnerable III to enemies. Also heals [1] for 3 turns to allies and enemies damaged by healing, and deals [2] to enemies.

Source Infusions:
1: +15% damage (+2% per Hydrosophist) while casting. Apply 2 Battered (+0.2 per Hydrosophist) to enemies.
2 (requires 5 Hydrosophist): Apply Armor of Frost, Fortify, and Haste to allies for 3 turns. Apply 2 Battered (+0.2 per Hydrosophist) to enemies. Gain an empowered Steam Lance skill that costs 2AP, for 1 turn.
3 (requires 9 Hydrosophist): +40% damage (+4% per Hydrosophist) while casting. Empowered Steam Lance can now be cast for 4 turns. Allies within 13m of your target, who have at least 1 Hydrosophist try to cast Steam Lance on your target as a free ritual reaction; for each ritual participant, gain +3% damage per Hydrosophist while casting.

MultiStrike_Vault.Description:
Teleport behind target character and perform a backstab, dealing [1].

Source Infusions:
1: +5% accuracy (+1% per Scoundrel) and +15% damage (+3% per Scoundrel) while casting. Recover 2AP.
2 (requires 5 Scoundrel): +40% damage (+8% per Scoundrel) while casting. Become Invisible until the end of your turn.
3 (requires 9 Scoundrel): Repeat base effects 2 times. Gain an Empowered Vault spell that has a 1 turn cooldown, for 3 turns. If cast while sneaking, Empowered Vault costs 2AP and has 13m range.

Shout_SpiderLegs.Description:
Apply Aspect of the Spider to yourself, which applies Hasted to you whenever you would normally be Slowed by a web surface, and granting Spin Web. Spin Web creates a web surface and applies up to Slowed III to enemies in a 3m radius around target point. These effects are mutually exclusive with Aspect of the Eagle.

Source Infusions:
1: Spin Web deals [1] and applies Calcifying for 2 turns.
2 (requires 5 Polymorph): Spin Web damage increased by 100%, and also applies Acid, Suffocating and Corroding for 1 turn. Recover 1SP.
3 (requires 9 Polymorph): Spin Web fires 3 projectiles, each dealing 40% of Spin Web damage. +2 turn duration. Recover 2AP.

Shout_MedusaHead.Description:
Apply Aspect of the Gorgon to yourself, granting +[1]% earth resistance, an aura that applies Slowed I to enemies in a [2] radius, and Petrifying Visage. Petrifying Visage deals Earth damage to enemies in a 13m radius around you and applies Calcifying and up to Subjugated II. These effects are mutually exclusive with Aspect of the Bull.

Source Infusions:
1: Petrifying Visage occurs upon transforming.
2 (requires 5 Polymorph): +1 turn duration. Petrifying Visage now costs 3AP and has a 1 turn cooldown. Recover 1SP.
3 (requires 9 Polymorph): Petrifying Visage occurs at the start of each turn. Petrifying Visage now costs 2AP. Recover 2AP.

Tiered statuses apply up to tier 3 and reduce resistances; see your journal for a full description.

Shout_BullHorns.Description:
Apply Aspect of the Bull to yourself, granting +0.5 Movement and Bull Rush. Bull Rush allows you to charge forward 12m in a straight line, dealing weapon damage and applying Bleeding to enemies caught in your advance. These effects are mutually exclusive with Aspect of the Gorgon.

Source Infusions:
1: Bull Rush base damage increased by 20%. Aspect of the Bull grants +20% damage.
2 (requires 5 Polymorph): Bull Rush base damage increased by 20%. Bull Rush AP cost -1 and applies 1 Battered. Recover 1SP.
3 (requires 9 Polymorph): Bull Rush base damage increased by 20%. Bull Rush AP cost -1 and hit radius +1m. Aspect of the Bull grants +10% damage.

Target_AMER_ElementalInfusion.Description:
Target a surface in range and apply the corresponding infusion to your Incarnate(s), altering their attack damage type and granting +100% to the appropriate resistance (except Blood, which grants +25% Physical and Piercing resistance).
- Water/Ice: Brittle immune, gain Hail Strike.
- Fire: Scorched immune, gain Fireball.
- Electrified: Charged immune, gain Dazing Bolt.
- Oil: Slowed/Calcifying immune, gain Impalement.
- Poison: Poisoned immune, gain Poison Dart.
- Blood: Bleeding immune, gain Mosquito Swarm.

Source Infusions:
1: Instead apply the Cursed/Blessed variant infusion of the element targeted, granting an extra skill.
Blessed Ice: Deep Freeze. Cursed Electricity: Vacuum Aura. Necrofire: Epidemic of Fire. Cursed Oil: Corrosive Spray. Acid: Virulent Spores. Cursed Blood: Infect.
2 (requires 5 Summoning): Gain an Empowered Elemental Infusion spell that costs 0AP and has a 1 turn cooldown, until the end of your turn. Empowered Elemental Infusion is able to apply a secondary Cursed/Blessed infusion and its spells do not share cooldowns with their counterparts. Recover 1SP.

Target_CripplingBlow.Description:
Debilitate target character with a tremendous strike, dealing [1] to it and enemies in a [2] radius.

Ataxia III consumes 7 Battered:
Target slowed and is Disarmed.

Source Infusions:
1: +5% accuracy (+1% per Warfare) and +25% damage (+4% per Warfare) while casting.
2 (requires 5 Warfare): +40% damage (+8% per Warfare) while casting. Repeat base effects. Recover 2AP.
3 (requires 9 Warfare): Repeat base effects. Allies within 13m of your target who have at least 1 Necromancer try to cast Infect on your target as a free ritual reaction; for each ritual participant, gain +3% damage per Warfare while casting.

Tiered statuses apply up to tier 3 and reduce resistances; see your journal for a full description.

Shout_FleshSacrifice.Description: <font size='19'>Suffer 10% of your maximum Vitality as Piercing damage in exchange for 1 AP and create a blood puddle under yourself. This effect cannot grant AP over your maximum.</font>

Target_SpontaneousCombustion.Description:
Flames that rack target character surge and explode, dealing [1]. If the target is affected by Scorched, remove it and repeat base effects for each turn of duration it had remaining to characters in a 2m radius.

Terrified III consumes 7 Harried:
Target loses attack of opportunity and spends AP fleeing.

Source Infusions:
1: Apply 1 stack of Battered and Harried for each turn of Scorched on the target.
2 (requires 5 Pyrokinetic): Apply Scorched for 4 turns before casting. Apply Disintegrating: Fire 25% (+2.5% per Pyrokinetic) while casting: Target suffers the listed percent of all damage taken (while Disintegrating) again as Fire when Disintegrating expires.
3 (requires 9 Pyrokinetic): Disintegrating lasts for 1 turn and causes combustion (as per this spell) of Scorched when it is applied.

Tiered statuses apply up to tier 3 and reduce resistances; see your journal for a full description.

Projectile_FlamingDaggers.Description:
Throw daggers of fire at [3] target points, each dealing [1] in a [2] radius.

Source Infusions:
1: +25% damage (+4% per Pyrokinetic) while casting.
2 (requires 5 Pyrokinetic): +40% damage (+8% per Pyrokinetic) while casting. Fire an additional projectile at each target chosen.
3 (requires 9 Pyrokinetic): Allies within 13m who have at least 1 Scoundrel or 1 Pyrokinetic try to cast Throwing Knife or Searing Daggers (respectively, Throwing Daggers takes priority) as a free ritual reaction, at all visible enemies within 13m of them; for each ritual participant, gain +3% damage per Pyrokinetic while casting.

Shout_FlamingTongues.Description:
Apply Flaming Tongues to yourself, rebuking enemies at the start of your turns, and when they enter or are moved into a [2] radius of you, applying Scorched for 2 turns, and dealing [1] to it and enemies within 1m of it.

Source Infusions:
1: +25% damage. Apply 1 Harried to targets struck. +1 turn duration.
2 (requires 5 Pyrokinetic): +25% damage. Damage chains +1 time to enemies in a 5m radius. Recover 1SP.
3 (requires 9 Pyrokinetic): +25% damage. Damage chains +1 time. +1 turn duration. Apply 2 Battered to targets struck.

Shout_ShedSkin.Description:
Become whole again, removing 3 Battered and Harried (+0.35 per Polymorph).
Cleanses Bleeding, Scorched, Poisoned, Subjugated, Weakened, Dazzled, and Slowed.

Source Infusions:
1: Resets cooldown of the non-Polymorph spell-school of your next spell cast within 2 turns but sets your armors to zero.
2 (requires 5 Polymorph): Pay 2 more AP: Resets the cooldown of all other spells, without setting armors to zero.

Shout_Ignition.Description:
Unleash a scorching nova, dealing [1] to enemies and igniting or melting susceptible surfaces and clouds in a [2] radius around you.

3 (requires 9 Pyrokinetic): Allies within 15m who have at least 1 Pyrokinetic try to cast Ignition as a free ritual reaction; for each ritual participant, repeat base effects 2 times. Ignitions created this way do not apply Scorched.

Momentarily open a singularity, dealing [1] to enemies in a [2] radius around you.

Squelched III consumes 7 Harried:
Target loses AP when using movement skills and is Silenced.

Source Infusions:
1: Gain Vacuum Aura for 2 turns, reapplying this cast's statuses to enemies who come within 8m, as well as to enemies within 8m at the start of your turns.

Summon_TotemFromSurface.Description:
Conjure a totem corresponding to the surface present at target point, which fires a damaging projectile at an enemy it can see each round, for 3 rounds.
- Wood Totem: Normal physical attack.
- Blood Totem: Physical, applies Bleeding.
- Oil Totem: Applies Slowed I.
- Poison Totem: Applies Poisoned.
- Water Totem: Applies Wet.
- Electric Totem: Electrifies surfaces.
- Fire Totem: Ignites surfaces.

Source Infusions:
1: Create one additional totem at target point.
2 (requires 5 Summoning): Create one more totem at your position and at any controlled non-totem summons you own. Apply Flaming Tongues for 3 turns to totems created.
3 (requires 9 Summoning): Apply Costly Evolution for 4 turns, and Persisting for 2 turns to totems created. Gain an empowered Elemental Totem spell that has no cooldown, for 4 turns.

- Poison Totem: Applies Poisoned.

Unleash a bolt of arcing lightning at target character that chains to up to [3] enemies in a [2] radius, dealing [1] to each target.

Target_Cannibalize.Description:
Consume target allied summon, restoring an amount of Vitality and Armor to you equivalent to the amount it had.

Source Infusions:
1: Target explodes, dealing 100% of its maximum Vitality as physical damage to characters within 3m of it.
2 (requires 5 Summoning): Cast Corpse Explosion on your target as it dies. +40% damage (+8% per Summoning) while casting.
3 (requires 9 Summoning): Target explosion now uses 200% of maximum Vitality. +40% damage (+8% per Summoning) while casting. Recover 1SP.

Shout_CloseTheDoor.Description:
Apply Persisting to your summons in a [1] radius around you, granting immunity to death from damage or running out of duration. This status does not preclude summons from dying to effects that kill the target without dealing damage.

Source Infusions:
1: +1 turn duration.
2 (requires 5 Summoning): Apply Death Instinct for 3 turns on allied summons within 13m.
3 (requires 9 Summoning): Apply Costly Evolution for 4 turns on allied summons within 13m.

Target_PowerInfusion.Description:
Apply Power Infusion to your Incarnate(s), granting +[1]% damage, +[2], and the ability to cast Battering Ram and Whirlwind.

Source Infusions:
1: Grant an additional 10% of your Power over 10 (+4% per Summoning) to your target.
2 (requires 5 Summoning): Grant an additional 10% of your Power over 10 (+4% per Summoning) to your target. Grant the Crippling Blow skill.

Target_MalleusMaleficarum_DazingBolt.Description: <font size='19'>Smite characters within target radius for [1], and +45% damage for each point of Necromancy that the initial target has. Blessed targets take no damage.</font>

Shout_SourceInfusion.Description:
Control the Source your next skill can expend, augmenting its power.

While casting a skill infused in this way, your tiered status applications require 2 fewer stacks of Battered/Harried to apply tier III.

Use this any number of times before casting a skill; each use increases your infusion count by one, limited by your current Source Points, after which the infusion resets to zero.

Shout_SteelSkin.Description:
Apply Heart of Steel to yourself, granting [1], immunity to teleportation, and restoring [2] at the start of your turn.

Source Infusions:
1: +10% Physical resistance (+1% per Polymorph). +1 turn duration.
2 (requires 5 Polymorph): Restore 25% Physical armor (+3% per Polymorph) every turn. Remove 1 Battered (+0.1 per Polymorph) every turn.
3 (requires 9 Polymorph): +10% Physical resistance (+1% per Polymorph). +25% maximum Physical armor (+3% per Polymorph). Remove 1 Battered (+0.1 per Polymorph) every turn.

Summon_Derpy_BoneshapedSkitterer.Description:
Raise a haphazardly coalesced hand of various bones that will attack enemies it sees with a melee strike, and will attempt to backstab.
On death, Boneshaped Skitterers explode, dealing damage to enemies within [1].

This summon does not count against your summon limit.

Shout_MassFeast.Description: <font size='19'>Feast on your Skitterers within 13m, killing them and recovering Vitality equal to their on death detonation's damage. If 3 or more Skitterers die in this way, summon an Empowered Boneshaped Skitterer at your location. Empowered Boneshaped Skitterer has improved stats, points into Necromancer, Attack of Opportunity, and deals double damage upon dying.</font>

Target_Apportation.Description:
Replace surfaces and clouds at the target points with a 1m Electrified Water surface and summon two Voltaic Spires for 2 turns. Instead of attacking, Voltaic Spires apply Charged to themselves and to every enemy within 3m at the start of their turns. The effects and damage dealt by the Voltaic Spires uses your own stats instead of theirs.

Source Infusions:
1: +1 turn duration. Voltaic Spires also deal [1] to enemies within 3m at the start of their turns.
2 (requires 5 Aerotheurge): On cast and on turn start, Voltaic Spires gain a stack of Conduit for 1 turn. Applying Charged outside of their turn emulates the effects of Lightning Bolt on the nearest enemy within 13m, and removes a stack.
3 (requires 9 Aerotheurge): +1 turn duration. Conduit stack amount is increased to 2.

Target_AMER_Taunt.Description:
Apply Taunted to enemies in a [1] radius around target point, increasing the likelihood that they will target you with their attacks and skills.

Source Infusions:
1: +1 turn duration.
2 (requires 5 Warfare): Gain an Empowered Provoke spell that applies Taunted for 2 turns and has a 0 turn cooldown, for 1 turn. Recover 1 SP.
3 (requires 9 Warfare): Empowered Provoke has a 2m radius and lasts for 3 turns.

Target_AMER_Taunt_Empowered_2.Description:
Apply Taunted to enemies in a [1] radius around target point, increasing the likelihood that they will target you with their attacks and skills.

Source Infusions:
1: +1 turn duration.
2 (requires 5 Warfare): Gain an Empowered Provoke spell that applies Taunted for 2 turns and has a 0 turn cooldown, for 1 turn. Recover 1 SP.
3 (requires 9 Warfare): Empowered Provoke has a 2m radius and lasts for 3 turns.

Target_AMER_Taunt_Empowered_3.Description:
Apply Taunted to enemies in a [1] radius around target point, increasing the likelihood that they will target you with their attacks and skills.

Source Infusions:
1: +1 turn duration.
2 (requires 5 Warfare): Gain an Empowered Provoke spell that applies Taunted for 2 turns and has a 0 turn cooldown, for 1 turn. Recover 1 SP.
3 (requires 9 Warfare): Empowered Provoke has a 2m radius and lasts for 3 turns.

Shout_NecromancerTotems.Description:
Summon necromantic totems from up to 2 corpses in a [1] radius around you. If there are fewer corpses than could be used within range, a random autonomous summon you own within range is sacrificed to count as the remaining corpses.

Source Infusions:
1: Totems are now created on up to three corpses.
2 (requires 5 Necromancer): Totems are now created on up to five corpses. Recover 1SP.
3 (requires 9 Necromancer): Create two totems per corpse instead of one.

Shout_IceBreaker.Description:
Violently shatter ice surfaces, creating a cloud that deals [1] to characters and applying Brittle in a [2] radius around you. Additionally, the ice surfaces shattered become water.

Source Infusions:
1: Create a 4m radius of ice around you.
2 (requires 5 Hydrosophist): Apply 3 Harried (+0.4 per Hydrosophist) to enemies within cast radius who are on a frozen surface.
3 (requires 9 Hydrosophist): Before casting, fill the cast radius with ice, then clear all surfaces and clouds within 1m of you. Recover 1SP.

Target_FirstAid.Description:
Administer a soothing poultice of medicinal herbs to target character, healing [1].
Cleanses Ataxia, Weakened, Squelched, Bleeding, Scorched, and Poisoned.

Source Infusions:
1: Additionally, heal 25% (+3% per Huntsman) of target's missing vitality.
2 (requires 5 Huntsman): Apply to all other allies within 13m.
3 (requires 9 Huntsman): Remove 2 Battered and Harried (+0.2 per Huntsman). Recover 1SP.

Target_WarpInfusion.Description:
Apply Warp Infusion to your Incarnate(s), granting +[1]% damage, +[2]% Dodge, Tactical Retreat, and Swap Places, which switches your position with your Incarnate's.

Source Infusions:
1: Grant an additional 10% of your Finesse over 10 (+4% per Summoning) to your target.
2 (requires 5 Summoning): Grant an additional 10% of your Finesse over 10 (+4% per Summoning) to your target. Grants an alternate version of the Netherswap spell that is not limited to once per round.
3 (requires 9 Summoning): Grant the Teleportation spell. Recover 1SP.

Shout_SelfPreservation.Description: <font size='19'>Inflict [1] to yourself, cleanse Ataxia, and gain Blight Shield for 2 turns. Blight Shield allows incoming Poison damage to also restore your armors by 65% of its damage.</font>
